timeline.bodyText:
I am not a big fan of a settings clause in the configuration.
The whole configuration is settings. It's settings for a transform.
Additionally, if we are ever going to say there are more transforms than pivot, this means those other transforms will have to abide by whatever settings are in this object.
It seems to me that these options should be in the pivot configuration.
timeline.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText:
Perhaps ThrottlingConfig
As max_page_search_size is already in PivotConfig it is tempting to add docs_per_second as a loose field in PivotConfig and avoid deprecating PivotConfig.max_page_search_size and the associated BWC code. Possibly I am just a lazy programmer
replies.author: davidkyle

timeline.bodyText: Early return might end up being more readable.
timeline.author: benwtrent

timeline.bodyText:
It seems to me that a null passed in here is where you want to set the default values back. Otherwise, it becomes complicated to know when a null means "not supplied" vs "revert to default"
Similar comment for setMaxPageSearchSize
timeline.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText:
I just found this to be a problem in hlrc (and fixed it there, not pushed yet).
However I wonder if this is really a problem in this place, both setters are not used, but only update. Maybe I rename this class to Updater and remove the setters.
replies.author: hendrikmuhs

timeline.bodyText: How can the user revert the page size to the default?
timeline.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText:
in case the user sets null, the parsing function sets a "null default", so newSettings.getMaxPageSearchSize() will not return null for this case.
However, I think there might still be some bug in here, will investigate.
replies.author: hendrikmuhs

timeline.author: davidkyle
davidkyle

timeline.bodyText: Can you deprecate the client PivotConfig.Builder.setMaxPageSearchSize method
timeline.author: davidkyle

timeline.bodyText:
Now this is a Tasks request it should override public boolean match(Task task) so that the transform ID in the request can be mapped to the transfrom task.
I scrolled down and see that this is handled in the action
timeline.author: davidkyle

timeline.message: enhance rolling upgrade test with update calls
add settings to transformconfigupdate in hlrc
handle settings defaults in hlrc and server
handle page size update if resetting to null
add an integration test for updating at runtime
